scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server" "npm-watch"
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*.*" "mobile/www" && npm run cordova -- prepare && copyfiles -u 1 "mobile/xwalk-command-line" "mobile/platforms/android/assets/" && npm run nw install 0.21.1
scripts.desktop: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*.*" "desktop/www" && npm run nw .
scripts.android: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*.*" "mobile/www" && npm run cordova -- run android
scripts.android-release: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*.*" "mobile/www" && npm run cordova -- build android --release
scripts.android-debug: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 "dist/**/*.*" "mobile/www" && npm run cordova -- build android --debug
